forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 63 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 14 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 56. West southwest wind 9 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

weather_report:
As the golden rays of the afternoon sun pour over Downtown San Francisco, a tranquil warmth envelops the city under a mostly clear sky. The temperature rests near a comfortable 65 degrees, gently cooling as the day drifts toward evening, reminiscent of summer days spent in lazy leisure. A soft breeze dances through the streets, lending a whisper to the trees and providing a refreshing contrast to the warmth. The weather is certainly pleasant, though hints of a marine layer are folded just beyond the golden outlines of the Golden Gate Bridge, maintaining that ineffable charm typical of this eclectic city.

As twilight approaches, the skies are predicted to become mostly cloudy, an inviting harbinger of cooler air settling in around 56 degrees. With the west-southwest winds picking up, noticeable gusts could playfully stir your hair as you step outside. For those seeking activities, a stroll along the waterfront could provide a perfect opportunity to enjoy the gentle waves and the stunning silhouettes of the cityscape against the fading light. An evening café visit, perhaps at a local spot with a view, would capture the essence of the city's character while keeping warmth in mind. Dress in layers, embracing the cool evening air so you can savor every moment of this atmospheric transition.
